name: Force
description: Damage from pure magical energy that bypasses most forms of protection and resistance. Force damage represents the raw power of magic itself.

resistanceCommon: Almost no creatures have force resistance
immunityCommon: Very few creatures or effects grant force immunity

specialRules: Bypasses most forms of damage resistance
Very few creatures resist or are immune to force damage
Often used for guaranteed damage effects
Magic Missile automatically hits and deals force damage
Cannot be easily blocked by physical barriers
One of the most reliable damage types in the game

examples: Wall of Force (spell, creates barrier but can trap)
